page.title: 13CLUBS - Continued
page.content: {Alford Wheelers}meet once a week and at every weekend when racing. Two wheelers members have been selected to ride for the{England}schoolboys competition in Holland in the 3 day {"Tour of Assen".}They have won many trophies and championships as a team and seperately through the past years. {Alford Players}entered a play called "Seperate Tables" at the Skegness festival this year and won 4 awards, for best set, best actor, best actress and were the runners up. The {Evening W.I.}came 3rd in the county W.I. of the year competition in 1983 and 1985.{Girl Guides}are celebrating their 75th year of guiding. To celebrate they have done an old time musical for 75 old age pensioners and have served 75 cups of coffee. Guides joined up with the Brownies and Rangers of Alford for this event.
